description:
Having done so much under the Overlord`s direct orders, Dennosuke now feels he must step up his game by becoming proactive. He decides to make a bold move by researching the marketplace with Urmander, hoping to find a hint to make the army even greater.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: The Best Way to Enjoy a Stroll Through the Marketplace in Another World
異世界一楽しい市場の歩き方
